parameters.description: 创建 User 对象时所需参数
parameters.name: data

value.description: Value 配置项的 Value. 目前只支持base64格式编码的字符串.

schedule.description: The schedule in Cron format, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cron.

mountPath.description: MountPath 配置文件挂载路径，代表这个服务如果想要成功运行，需要到那个路径下去获取这个配置文件.

name.description: Name 一个ConfigMap对象的名称，必须是与应用同命名空间下的一个可用ConfigMap对象的名称.
Name of the variable. Must be a C_IDENTIFIER.

value.description: Value of the variable, as defined in Kubernetes core API.

mountPath.description: MountPath 持久化存储挂载路径.

name.description: Name 一个 PersistentVolumeClaim 对象的名称，必须是与应用同命名空间下的一个可用 PersistentVolumeClaim 对象的名称.

activeDeadlineSeconds.description:
Specifies the duration in seconds relative to the startTime that the job may be active
before the system tries to terminate it; value must be positive integer
+optional

completions.description:
Specifies the desired number of successfully finished pods the
job should be run with.  Setting to nil means that the success of any
pod signals the success of all pods, and allows parallelism to have any positive
value.  Setting to 1 means that parallelism is limited to 1 and the success of that
pod signals the success of the job.
More info: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/workloads/controllers/jobs-run-to-completion/
+optional

parallelism.description:
Specifies the maximum desired number of pods the job should
run at any given time. The actual number of pods running in steady state will
be less than this number when ((.spec.completions - .status.successful) < .spec.parallelism),
i.e. when the work left to do is less than max parallelism.
More info: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/workloads/controllers/jobs-run-to-completion/
+optional

podTemplate.description: PodTemplate 定义了 Job 对象管理的 Pod 对象的定义参数.

containerCommand.description: Command that is executed instead of container entrypoint, if specified.

containerCommandArgs.description:
Arguments for the specified container command or container entrypoint (if command is not
specified here).

containerImage.description: Docker image path for the application.

cpuRequirement.description: Optional CPU requirement for the container.

labels.description: Labels that will be defined on Pods/RCs/Services

memoryRequirement.description: Optional memory requirement for the container.

restartPolicy.description:
Restart policy for all containers within the pod.
One of Always, OnFailure, Never.
